name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction 

Week 2-3: On painting

Week 4-5: On film

Week 6-8: Style: Lessons 5-6
(Week 7: university holiday, essay topic with bibliography submission)

Week 9: Mid-term essay due 

Week 10-12: On literature

Week 13-15: Style: Lessons 7-9
(Week 14: presentation topics submission)
(Week 15: Final essay first draft submission)

Week 16-17: Presentation weeks

Week 18: Final essay due
scorePolicy:
Teaching Approach:
The students are expected to have read the required primary texts before the lecture. Classes will be in the form of lectures and workshops. Assessments include tutorial participations, presentation, mid-term and final essay.

Continuous Assessments
Tutorial participation: 	        10%
Presentation: 				20%
Mid-term essay:			30% (proposal 10%, final revision 20%)
Final essay:				40% (proposal 20%, final revision 20%)
materials: Williams, Joseph M. and Gregory G. Colomb. Style: Lessons in Clarity and Grace. (10th ed). London: Longman, 2010
